div span
div ~ span
div > span
div + span
div#temp
div.test[title="test"]
.test[title~="test"]
div > [title|="test"]
div.test[title^="test"]
span#test[title$="test"]
span[title*="test"]::after
div[title]
[title]
a:link
div, span > div:hover, a
div span#foo.test div:hover#bar a

:visited
:active
:focus
:target
:root
:enabled
:disabled
:checked
:indeterminate
:first-child
:last-child
:first-of-type
:last-of-type
:only-child
:only-of-type
